name: Precursor (Smoldered Pastries)
description:
Precursor is a game we made for the Brackey's 2021.1 Jam. We like the designs and characters enough that we want to expand greatly upon it, but for now, this is what we were able to do in one week!

This is also our first game! We learned a lot from making it, and absolutely scrambled to meet the deadline.

Controls-

Player1 - NUMPAD 1
Player2 - NUMBPAD 2
Player 3 - NUMBPAD 3

Run- A, D
Jump- Spacebar

Characters of a specific color can go through their colored walls.

have fun!!
